r.s: Simple class for converting base set of numbers with a customizable character base set.
r.n:
ATTENTION: BC BREAK - Class named changed from Basex to Math_Basex - Support for PHP extentions, detected automaticly for easy usage - stdBase for standard set of characters (for binary, decimal, heximal, etc number bases) - singleton support - Quick base convert using the baseConvert function
Changes provided by Stefan Walk.
